remarks: Modular law for hyperplanes analogous to ~ atmod2i2 for atoms. (Contributed by NM, 9-Feb-2013.)
statement:
lhpmod.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lhpmod.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lhpmod.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
lhpmod.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
lhpmod.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhpmod2i2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ Y .<_ X ) -> ( ( X ./\ W ) .\/ Y ) = ( X ./\ ( W .\/ Y ) ) ) $.
